function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty about the return of activities leading to systems being left turned on in buildings.","Impact":"Increased energy consumption and potential for equipment wear and tear.","Mitigation":"Implementation of clear guidelines for building coordinators and staff regarding system usage during unoccupied periods.","Technologies":"Energy monitoring and control systems, remote monitoring and control technology.","People":"Building coordinators, staff, maintenance personnel.","Owner":"Building management, facility managers, maintenance personnel."},{"Description":"Organizational culture contributing to baseline energy consumption during unoccupied periods.","Impact":"Higher energy costs and environmental impact.","Mitigation":"Conducting investigations and interventions to change the organizational culture, implementing energy-saving practices and policies.","Technologies":"Employee training and awareness programs, energy-efficient equipment, energy management software.","People":"Building occupants, management, maintenance personnel.","Owner":"Building management, facility managers, sustainability teams."}]}
